Reading

As described in the syllabus, you are expected to read each section prior to each class. The reading assignments are listed below.

Note: All dates further than one week in advance are tentative, and may be changed without notice.

For warm-up problems:

  • Pay attention to the due dates, some warm-up assignments involve two sections.

  • You must show your work (as applicable) to receive credit.

  • You may work with others on these warm-up assignments.

  • You must turn these in yourself, on paper, at the beginning of class, on the assigned date.

Chapter 10 – Vectors and the Geometry of Space

Section 10.1: read pp. 537-541 warm-up 1a, do problem 6 [due 8/22]

Section 10.2: read pp. 542-549 warm-up 1b, do problem 2 [due 8/24]

Section 10.3: read pp. 551-555 warm-up 2, do problem 1 [due 8/27]

Section 10.4: read pp. 558-564 warm-up 3, do problem 8 [due 8/29]

Section 10.5: read pp. 566-572 warm-up 4, do problem 2 [due 8/31]

Section 10.6: read pp. 574-579 warm-up 5, do problem 1 [due 9/05]

Section 10.7: read pp. 580-588 warm-up 6, do problem 3 [due 9/07]

Section 10.8: read pp. 591-593 warm-up 7, do problem 1 [due 9/10]

Chapter 11 – Partial Derivatives

Section 11.1: read pp. 615-622 warm-up 8, do problem 1 [due 9/12]

Section 11.3: read pp. 633-638 warm-up 9, do problem 1 [due 9/14]

Section 11.4: read pp. 641-645 warm-up 10, do problem 1 [due 9/17]

Section 11.5: read pp. 649-655 warm-up 11, do problem 1 [due 9/19]

Section 11.6: read pp. 658-666 warm-up 12, do problem 3 [due 9/21]

Section 11.7: read pp. 669-675 warm-up 13, do problem 3 (omit graphs) [due 10/1]

Section 11.8: read pp. 677-682 warm-up 14, do problem 1 [due 10/3]

Chapter 12 – Multiple Integrals

Section 12.1: read pp. 689-698 warm-up 15, do problem 1 [due 10/10]

Section 12.2: read pp. 700-707 warm-up 16, do problem 1 [due 10/12]

Section 12.3: read pp. 709-713 warm-up 17, do problems 1-4 [due 10/15]

Section 12.4: read pp. 715-719 warm-up 18, do problem 3 [due 10/17]

Section 12.5: read pp. 720-728 warm-up 19, do problem 1 [due 10/19]

Section 12.6: read pp. 731-734 warm-up 20, do problems 5-6 [due 10/31]

Section 12.7: read pp. 735-739 warm-up 21, do problems 5-6 [due 11/02]

Chapter 13 – Vector Calculus

Section 13.1: read pp. 755-759 warm-up 22, do problem 1 [due 11/07]

Section 13.2: read pp. 761-770 warm-up 23, do problem 1 [due 11/09]

Section 13.3: read pp. 773-780 warm-up 24, do problem 3 [due 11/12]

Section 13.4: read pp. 782-787 warm-up 25, do problem 1 [due 11/14]

Section 13.5: read pp. 789-795 warm-up 26, do problem 1 [due 11/16]

Section 13.6: read pp. 797-804 warm-up 27, do problems 11-14 [due 11/26]

Section 13.7: read pp. 807-816 warm-up 28, do problem 1 [due 11/28]

Section 13.8: read pp. 818-822 warm-up 29, do problem 1 [due 11/30]

Section 13.9: read pp. 823-828 warm-up 30, do problem 1 [due 12/03]
